name: .KITTY
summary: Learn about .KITTY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open KITTY files with the iOS version of Raptisoft Robot Wants Kitty. You can also open KITTY files with the cross-platform Tiled map editor (with the RWK Tiled plugin installed) to modify the levels.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .kitty file in Tiled 2 with RWK Tiled plugin
images.caption: KITTY file open in Tiled 2 with RWK Tiled plugin
